Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring that every bicycle with electric assist, electric scooter and other legal motorized vehicle be licensed and registered
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring that every bicycle with electric assist, electric scooter and other legal motorized vehicle be licensed and registered.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to the establishment of a task force to study options for making street design and infrastructure safer in consideration of increased use of electric bicycles and related collisions
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishment of a task force to study options for making street design and infrastructure safer in consideration of increased use of electric bicycles and related collisions.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the New York State Governor to sign, S.7587/A.7833, known as the “Commercial E-Bike Licensing Act,” which requires the registration of bicycles with electric assist used for commercial purposes and creates liability for employers for certain violations.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Oversight - Planning Our Shared Streets in New York City: Integrating Micromobility Options.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Planning Our Shared Streets in New York City: Integrating Micromobility Options.

Items.Title: Oversight - Planning Our Shared Streets in New York City: Integrating Micromobility Options.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Planning Our Shared Streets in New York City: Integrating Micromobility Options.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring that every bicycle with electric assist, electric scooter and other legal motorized vehicle be licensed and registered
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring that every bicycle with electric assist, electric scooter and other legal motorized vehicle be licensed and registered.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to the establishment of a task force to study options for making street design and infrastructure safer in consideration of increased use of electric bicycles and related collisions
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishment of a task force to study options for making street design and infrastructure safer in consideration of increased use of electric bicycles and related collisions.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the New York State Governor to sign, S.7587/A.7833, known as the “Commercial E-Bike Licensing Act,” which requires the registration of bicycles with electric assist used for commercial purposes and creates liability for employers for certain violations.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council MEmbers Attending: Marte, Bottcher, Brewer, Marmorato, Paladino, Holden, Restler, Ossé, Banks and Public Advocate Williams
